rules.natural: Provided that a hurricane phenomenon is detected, the weather service organization is operational.
If a tornado phenomenon is detected, then the weather service organization is operational.
Whenever satellite imagery is available for the hurricane zone, a hurricane phenomenon is detected.
Satellite imagery is available for the hurricane zone or Doppler radar is active in the tornado corridor.
Under the condition that the response team emergency protocol is activated, a public alert warning is issued.
Either backup power is available for the control center or, if the chief forecaster meteorologist is on duty, then the response team emergency protocol is activated.
There is an equipment malfunction in the sensor network or the weather service organization is operational.
Provided that a field crew technician is dispatched, maintenance is scheduled for a system check.
A field crew technician is dispatched, or replacement parts are available for sensor components.

Provided that the 24-hour outlook forecast is reliable, if it is not the case that replacement parts being available for sensor components implies the sensor network does not have an equipment malfunction, then the sensor array repair is completed.
Under the condition that data verification quality assurance has passed, the 24-hour outlook forecast is reliable.
If the satellite feed data stream is interrupted, then the transmission tower signal is lost.
The satellite feed data stream is interrupted, or the prediction software system is not calibrated.
Provided that the transmission tower signal is lost, the alternative link backup connection is not active.
Provided that cross-reference is completed with multiple sources, historical storm tracks patterns are analyzed.
Cross-reference is completed with multiple sources, or field observations ground truth is verified.
Whenever field observations ground truth is verified, a tornado phenomenon is detected.
If atmospheric pressure readings data are corrected, then a hurricane phenomenon is detected.
Provided that historical storm tracks patterns are analyzed, atmospheric pressure readings data are corrected.
Under the condition that the control panel manual override is engaged, the failover mode system redundancy is not active.

A critical error is detected on the main server, or if it is not the case that the emergency procedure contingency plan is executed or maintenance is scheduled for a system check or the sensor network does not have an equipment malfunction, then the control panel manual override is engaged.
Provided that wind patterns data is analyzed, barometric pressure data is collected.
If the core infrastructure system is stable, then a critical error is not detected on the main server.
Under the condition that there is a power fluctuation in the grid supply, the stabilizer unit has regulated voltage.
Provided that there is a power fluctuation in the grid supply, the stabilizer unit does not have regulated voltage.

Whenever the severe storm forecast is accurate, if it is not the case that funding is approved for the meteorology department or, if the weather service organization is not operational, then the thermometer sensor is not functioning, then wind patterns data is analyzed.
If the prediction software system is calibrated, then the storm model is validated.
Provided that the storm model is validated, regional forecasts have consistent predictions.
Under the condition that the storm model is validated, regional forecasts do not have consistent predictions.
Provided that it is not the case that Doppler radar being active in the tornado corridor implies a tornado phenomenon is detected, the chief forecaster meteorologist is on duty.
If it is not the case that Doppler radar being active in the tornado corridor implies a tornado phenomenon is detected, then a public alert warning is not issued.

If it is not the case that funding is approved for the meteorology department or, if the weather service organization is not operational, then the thermometer sensor is not functioning, then barometric pressure data is not collected.

Provided that it is not the case that replacement parts being available for sensor components implies the sensor network does not have an equipment malfunction, the sensor array repair is not completed.
If it is not the case that the transmission tower signal being lost implies the alternative link backup connection is active, then manual collection is not initiated by ground teams.

Provided that it is not the case that the emergency procedure contingency plan is executed or maintenance is scheduled for a system check or the sensor network does not have an equipment malfunction, the failover mode system redundancy is active.
Provided that it is not the case that the monitoring ground station being active implies the weather satellite is operational, the prediction software system is calibrated.

Under the condition that it is not the case that, if it is not the case that the transmission tower signal being lost implies the alternative link backup connection is active, then manual collection is initiated by ground teams, the national alert emergency broadcast is activated.
If data verification quality assurance has not passed, then the daily summary report is submitted.
Provided that data verification quality assurance has not passed, the daily summary report is not submitted.
Whenever the core infrastructure system is not stable, there is a power fluctuation in the grid supply.
If the weather service organization is not operational, then the thermometer sensor is functioning.
Provided that the weather service organization is not operational, the monitoring ground station is active.
Under the condition that the weather service organization is not operational, the weather satellite is not operational.

(A11 → G).natural: Provided that a hurricane phenomenon is detected, the weather service organization is operational.

(A11 ∨ A12).natural: Either a hurricane phenomenon is detected or a tornado phenomenon is detected.

(A12 → G).natural: If a tornado phenomenon is detected, then the weather service organization is operational.

(A13 → A11).natural: Whenever satellite imagery is available for the hurricane zone, a hurricane phenomenon is detected.

(A13 ∨ A14).natural: Satellite imagery is available for the hurricane zone or Doppler radar is active in the tornado corridor.

(A14 → A12).natural: Under the condition that Doppler radar is active in the tornado corridor, a tornado phenomenon is detected.

(A16 → A15).natural: Provided that the chief forecaster meteorologist is on duty, a public alert warning is issued.

(A16 → A17).natural: If the chief forecaster meteorologist is on duty, then the response team emergency protocol is activated.

(A17 → A15).natural: Under the condition that the response team emergency protocol is activated, a public alert warning is issued.

(A18 ∨ (A16 → A17)).natural: Either backup power is available for the control center or, if the chief forecaster meteorologist is on duty, then the response team emergency protocol is activated.

(A19 ∨ G).natural: There is an equipment malfunction in the sensor network or the weather service organization is operational.

(A2 ∨ (¬G → ¬A1)).natural: Funding is approved for the meteorology department, or if the weather service organization is not operational, then the thermometer sensor is not functioning.

(A20 ∨ ¬A19).natural: Maintenance is scheduled for a system check, or it is not the case that the sensor network has an equipment malfunction.

(A21 ∨ A22).natural: A field crew technician is dispatched, or replacement parts are available for sensor components.

(A25 → A24).natural: Under the condition that data verification quality assurance has passed, the 24-hour outlook forecast is reliable.

(A27 → A28).natural: If the satellite feed data stream is interrupted, then the transmission tower signal is lost.

(A27 ∨ ¬A8).natural: The satellite feed data stream is interrupted, or the prediction software system is not calibrated.

(A28 → A29).natural: Whenever the transmission tower signal is lost, the alternative link backup connection is active.

(A28 → ¬A29).natural: Provided that the transmission tower signal is lost, the alternative link backup connection is not active.

(A32 → A11).natural: If cross-reference is completed with multiple sources, then a hurricane phenomenon is detected.

(A32 → A34).natural: Under the condition that cross-reference is completed with multiple sources, atmospheric pressure readings data are corrected.

(A4 → A3).natural: Provided that wind patterns data is analyzed, barometric pressure data is collected.
